nodes.text: The Renatasian Confederation was a loose association of exiles from the destroyed nation-states of the Renatasia system. Led by Klyn Shanga, these fighter aces sought to hunt down the Butcher of Renatasia. They eventually killed Osuno Whett, the man responsible for betraying Renatasia to the Centrality and the Empire.
The group included Bern Nuladeg, and Colonel Kenow, veteran pilots and close friends of Shanga, who came out of retirement to help in the quest for vengeance.
